name: It's Snow Joke
description:
A sudden snow storm has appeared and it's effing cold outside!
You better rush home before you freeze!
Watch out for frozen fish and icicles while collecting as many point as possible.

Arrow Keys to move.
Up key to jump.
Down Key to toggle the roll.

WASD keys also work the same way.

Q - In Game control reminder
H - Hints
Esc or P - Pause the game
